downloadFile.name: Microsoft System Center Management Pack for Microsoft Azure.msi
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/8/b/3/8b322826-b080-4c6a-9c62-db0f42010039/Microsoft System Center Management Pack for Microsoft Azure.msi

detailsSection:
This is the CTP version 1.8.0.9 of the Azure MP which includes new features and improvements over the last released version 1.8.0.8. 
This version has a fix for following bugs - 

ADAL Deprecation - update latest MSAL binaries.
Auto SPN creation is not working in Azure MP.
Removal of Azure MP Silverlight changes.
Not receiving alerts for Azure Web tests in SCOM while alerts are seen in Azure Portal.
Some SQR alerts are not changing its state from Healthy to Critical.
Azure MP - SCOM console is getting crashed while creating template.

The CTP guide has details about new feature and improvements offered in this version of management pack. 
MicrosoftAzureMPFullGuide can help you with detailed steps to setup Azure MP and the existing capabilities that this MP provides. This version is released so our customers can try our new features and share feedback. Please share your feedback with us at SCOM User Voice.
detailsSection_file_name: Microsoft System Center Management Pack for Microsoft Azure.msi
installInstructionSection: Please refer the MP guide for instructions.
